name: Project 4 3D Shooter Tutorial (Doomsectoid 3D beta)
description:
My proposed modifications for this game are:

1. Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.

2. Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.

3. Create a new UI element that tracks the amount of enemies killed.

Created by: Ben Salva for CAS 117

Guidance by:

Brian Winn & Declan McClintock

*Warning* If you are playing this game in the browser the mouse sensitivity is very high for some reason so I recommend manually lowering your mouse sensitivity before play.
